Class MonopolyProperty

java.lang.Object
  Property
      BuyableProperty
          MonopolyProperty

public class MonopolyProperty
extends BuyableProperty

This class can be used to create buyable Mononpoly properties. Each property can be distinguished by a specific monopoly color and its rent values.

Author:
Mr. Kevin Dietzler

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

MonopolyProperty

public MonopolyProperty(String n,
                        int t,
                        int i,
                        int c,
                        int m,
                        int color,
                        int basicR,
                        int oneHR,
                        int twoHR,
                        int threeHR,
                        int fourHR,
                        int hotelR,
                        int bC)
This constructor sets the values for all the MonopolyProperty attributes.

Parameters:
n - the name of the Property
t - an int denoting what type the property is (see the getType method)
i - the index of the Property on the board
c - the cost of the Property
m - the mortgage value of the Property
color - the Monopoly color the Property
basicR - the basic rent of the Property
oneHR - the rent of the Property with one house
twoHR - the rent of the Property with two houses
threeHR - the rent of the Property with three houses
fourHR - the rent of the Property with four houses
hotelR - the rent of the Property with a hotel
bC - the cost to build a house or hotel on this Property
Method Detail

getRent

public int getRent(int factor)
This method uses the factor parameter to determine how much rent must be payed on this property.

If factor =

0: basic rent

1: one house rent

2: two house rent

3: three house rent

4: four house rent

5: hotel rent

Specified by:
getRent in class BuyableProperty
Parameters:
factor - used to determine how much rent must be payed when a player lands on this property
Returns:
the rent that must be payed
